Class Tv

java.lang.Object
Tv
public class Tv extends Object
class for television

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Tv()
    Builds a Tv of unknown brand, initially it is off, ready for channel 5 and sound volume is 3 for a max sound level of 10.
    Tv(String brand)
    Builds a Tv of given brand, initially it is off, ready for channel 5 and sound volume is 3 for a max sound level of 10.

    turn this tv off
    void

    turn this tv on
    String
    toString()
    provide a string representation for this Tv object
    void
    volumeDown()
    increase sound level if tv is on, sound level can not be negative
    void
    volumeUp()
    increase sound level if on, sound level can not be greater than max level

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait
